V0507_01_00_00_0.text: I'm really looking forward to our Duel!

V0507_01_00_01_0.text:
You don't want to Duel me.
You're gonna make yourself sad.

V0507_01_00_02_0.text:
Hey everyone!
My show is about to start!

V0507_01_00_03_0.text: Let's see if you're worth my time!

V0507_01_00_04_0.text:
Bring it on.
You'll learn how much better I am than you.

V0507_01_00_05_0.text: You're gonna love the moves I have for you!

V0507_01_00_06_0.text: Maybe I'll go a little harder than usual.

V0507_03_00_00_0.text:
Huh?
Are you already out of moves?

V0507_03_00_01_0.text: Nothing left to do but crush you.

V0507_03_00_04_0.text: If you're actually gonna play hard, I'll play hard too!

V0507_03_00_05_0.text:
You shouldn't have made me upset!
Cuz now you're gonna pay!

V0507_05_00_00_0.text: I'm gonna finish you quicker than this lollypop!

V0507_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my Set card!

V0507_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0507_11_08_01_0.text:
I build the Overlay Network!
Xyz Summon!

V0507_11_09_01_0.text:
Swing far, pendulum!
Carve the arc of calamity!

V0507_14_00_01_0.text:
This is the moment you've been waiting for!
Let's battle!

V0507_21_00_00_0.text:
Huh? You were so confident a second ago.
What happened?

V0507_21_00_03_0.text: With that, I end my turn!

V0507_21_00_04_0.text:
I'm still gonna get you!
Just you wait!

V0507_21_00_05_0.text: I'm letting you get away with stuff to make things fun.

V0507_28_00_00_0.text:
Sigh...
I thought our Duel would be more fun.

V0507_28_00_01_0.text: This wasn't a surprise knowing how good I am.

V0507_28_00_02_0.text:
Was this your best?
You're kidding, right?

V0507_28_00_03_0.text:
Haha!
Now you know how awesome I am!

V0507_28_00_04_0.text:
Heh heh heh!
That looked rough!

V0507_28_00_05_0.text:
A Duel isn't fun and games.
Winning is everything!

V0507_28_00_06_0.text:
Wow, Yuya!
You pulled out some new moves there!

V0507_28_00_07_0.text:
Sigh...
You didn't do well at all!

V0507_28_00_07_1.text: It's like you forgot everything I taught you.

V0507_29_00_00_0.text:
Hahahaha!
This Duel was a lot of fun!

V0507_29_00_00_1.text:
But I'm gonna win next time!
Count on it!

V0507_29_00_01_0.text:
Argh!
I promise I'll win our rematch!

V0507_29_00_02_0.text:
Wait!
Our Duel isn't over yet!
There's no way I can lose!

V0507_29_00_03_0.text: How could this amateur defeat me?

V0507_29_00_04_0.text:
Hey! Come back here!
Duel me again!

V0507_29_00_05_0.text:
This can't be true!
I never lose! Never!

V0507_29_00_06_0.text:
Hahaha!
Never a boring moment with you, Yuya!

V0507_29_00_06_1.text: That's why I always enjoy Dueling against you!

V0507_29_00_07_0.text:
Wow!
You've really upped your game.

V0507_29_00_07_1.text: It makes me proud to be your teacher.

V0507_29_00_08_0.text:
Wow, big brows.
You were no nonsense today.

V0507_33_00_01_0.text: Only Duel Academy's Fusion Summon is the real deal!

V0507_33_00_02_0.text: I'm ready to swing into action!

V0507_30_00_00_0.text: My biggest flaw is that I'm too  nice.

V0507_30_00_01_0.text: I don't get a good vibe from that move.

V0507_30_00_02_0.text:
What’s the matter?
You feelin’ sick or somethin’?

V0507_34_00_00_0.text:
I got my fans stoked.
You should do the same.

V0507_34_00_01_0.text: Why do you hafta be a downer? We're here to put on a show.

V0507_34_00_02_0.text: Aren't you even gonna try to counter my moves?

V0507_34_00_03_0.text: It's taking everything you have just to defend.

V0507_34_00_04_0.text: I'm more focused on my lollypop than this Duel.

V0507_34_00_05_0.text: What are you going to do?

V0507_34_00_06_0.text: How long are you gonna keep this up?

V0507_34_00_08_0.text: I can tell you're going easy on me. Stop that!

V0507_34_00_09_0.text:
This is okay to do, right?
Right right right?

V0507_35_00_01_0.text: I'll teach you how powerful Fusion Summoning is!

V0507_36_00_01_0.text:
We're switching places.
It's your turn.

V0507_36_00_02_0.text:
It's not over yet!
This is where the comeback begins!

V0507_36_00_06_0.text: Let's see what the Xyz can do.

V0507_08_00_01_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Frightfur Fusion!

V0507_08_00_02_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Frightfur Patchwork!

V0507_08_00_03_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Frightfur Reborn!

V0507_08_00_04_0.text: I banish Frightfur Reborn from my Grave to use its effect!

V0507_08_00_05_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Frightfur Repair!

V0507_08_00_06_0.text: I banish Frightfur Repair from my Grave to play its effect!

V0507_08_00_07_0.text: I activate the Spell Card, Toy Parade!

V0507_08_00_08_0.text: I banish Toy Parade from my Graveyard to use its effect!

V0507_08_00_09_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Spell!
Frightfur Sanctuary!

V0507_08_00_10_0.text: Frightfur Sanctuary activates when it goes to the Graveyard!

V0507_08_00_11_0.text: I activate the Continuous Spell, Frightfur Factory!

V0507_08_00_13_0.text: Frightfur Factory activates when it's sent to the Graveyard!

V0507_08_00_14_0.text: I'll activate my Spell Card, Suture Rebirth!

V0507_08_00_15_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Spell!
Toy Vendor!

V0507_08_00_17_0.text: Toy Vendor's effect activates when it goes to the Graveyard!

V0507_08_00_18_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Instant Fusion!

V0507_08_00_19_0.text:
I activate my Quick-Play Spell!
De-Fusion!

V0507_08_00_20_0.text:
I activate my Spell Card!
Fusion Recovery!

V0507_08_00_21_0.text:
Check out this Spell Card!
I activate Fusion Conscription!

V0507_08_00_22_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Designer Frightfur!

V0507_08_00_23_0.text:
I activate my Continuous Trap!
Frightfur Jar!

V0507_08_00_25_0.text: Frightfur Jar activates when it's sent to the Graveyard!

V0507_08_00_26_0.text:
I activate my Counter Trap!
Frightfur March!

V0507_08_00_27_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Fusion Fright Waltz!

V0507_08_00_27_1.text: This dance card’s filling up to two-step all over you!

V0507_08_00_28_0.text:
I'll save you!
I activate my Trap Card!
Fluffal Crane!

V0507_08_00_31_0.text: Edge Imp Cotton Eater's Pendulum Effect activates!

V0507_08_00_32_0.text: I activate Fluffal Angel's Pendulum Effect!

V0507_09_00_00_1.text: Frightfur Bear equips the monster it destroyed!

V0507_09_00_01_1.text: Now your monster belongs to me!

V0507_09_00_02_0.text: Frightfur Sheep's effect activates when it's destroyed!

V0507_09_00_04_0.text: If Frightfur Tiger is Fusion Summoned, its effect activates!

V0507_09_00_05_0.text: Frightfur Sabre-Tooth activates when it's Fusion Summoned!

V0507_09_00_09_0.text: Frightfur Cruel Whale activates when it's Fusion Summoned!

V0507_09_00_10_0.text: I activate Frightfur Cruel Whale's effect!

V0507_09_00_12_0.text: Edge Imp Sabres's effect activates from my Graveyard!

V0507_09_00_13_0.text: When Edge Imp Saw is summoned, its effect activates!

V0507_09_00_15_0.text: Edge Imp Chain activates when it goes to the Graveyard!

V0507_09_00_16_0.text: I activate Edge Imp Tomahawk's effect!

V0507_09_00_18_0.text: I activate Edge Imp Scythe's effect from my hand!

V0507_09_00_19_0.text: Cotton Eater's effect activates when it's Special Summoned!

V0507_09_00_20_0.text: I activate Fluffal Bear's effect from my hand!

V0507_09_00_21_0.text: I Tribute Fluffal Bear to activate its effect!

V0507_09_00_23_0.text: I return a Fluffal to my hand to use Fluffal Sheep's effect!

V0507_09_00_25_0.text: I banish Fluffal Wings from my Graveyard to play its effect!

V0507_09_00_26_0.text: When summoned from my hand, Fluffal Owl's effect activates!

V0507_09_00_28_0.text: Fluffal Octopus's effect activates when it's summoned!

V0507_09_00_29_0.text: Fluffal Octopus activates when it's used to Fusion Summon!

V0507_09_00_31_0.text: Fluffal Cat activates when it's used to Fusion Summon!

V0507_09_00_32_0.text: Fluffal Dog's effect activates when it's summoned!

V0507_09_00_34_0.text: Fluffal Dolphin's effect activates when it's used to Fusion Summon!

V0507_09_00_36_0.text: I used Fluffal Penguin to Fusion Summon a Frightfur!

V0507_09_00_37_0.text: Since I used Fluffal Rabbit to Fusion Summon, watch this!

V0507_37_00_00_0.text: Edge of sharpness and fury of bear!

V0507_37_00_00_1.text: When the two come together, you had better beware!

V0507_13_00_00_0.text:
Here it comes!
The most unbearable monster you’ve ever seen!

V0507_37_00_01_0.text: Fury of fists, creature of calamity, patron of pain!

V0507_37_00_01_1.text: When the three come together, victory is attained!

V0507_13_00_01_0.text: Come on out, my mighty mash-up!

V0507_37_00_02_0.text: Chain of destruction, will of warrior!

V0507_37_00_02_1.text: When the two come together, none are superior!

V0507_13_00_02_0.text: Presenting the heavyweight champion-sheep of chains!

V0507_37_00_03_0.text: Sharpened steel and ruler of the terrain!

V0507_37_00_03_1.text: When the two come together, it will end your reign!

V0507_13_00_03_0.text:
Let's go!
The real steel of the animal kingdom!

V0507_37_00_04_0.text: When my monsters become one, you're more than done!

V0507_37_00_05_0.text: When my monsters become one, you're more than done!

V0507_13_00_05_0.text: Here’s the wild, wicked cat that’s all paws, claws and jaws!

V0507_37_00_06_0.text: Shards of sharpness and bringer of defeat!

V0507_37_00_06_1.text: When the two come together, your heart will skip a beat!

V0507_13_00_06_0.text: You’re about to face a seafarer’s worst nightmare!

V0507_13_00_10_0.text:
Rise from the depths!
Frightfur Cruel Whale!

V0507_13_00_11_0.text:
Here's my Pendulum Monster!
Frightfur Meister!

V0507_13_00_18_0.text:
Here comes a Pendulum Monster!
Edge Imp Cotton Eater!

V0507_13_00_19_0.text: Here's my cute and furry Fluffal Bear!

V0507_13_00_21_0.text:
Check out my barnyard buddy!
Fluffal Sheep!

V0507_19_00_01_0.text: When this card attacks, you can't activate your effects!

V0507_19_00_02_0.text: When this card attacks, you can't activate your effects!

V0507_19_00_03_0.text: You can't escape the leader of the animal kingdom!

V0507_19_00_06_0.text: Frightfur Kraken's dragging you into the deep!

V0507_19_00_21_0.text:
This attack's gonna be so cute!
Go, Fluffal Sheep!

V0507_44_00_02_0.text: Only one will rule the Duel...

V0507_44_00_03_0.text: In the ultimate fusion of monsters and mayhem!

V0507_45_00_00_0.text: Now's a good time for an Action Card!

V0507_27_00_01_0.text: How could I let this happen...
